
                            
                            <p>借出去4k，说的一个月还，现在都两年了还在拖着 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202412/30/102330sl80uqg4744r0vv7.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202412/30/102330sl80uqg4744r0vv7.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">可以给 不要借 </p><p class="pl">有个人借了我1500&nbsp;&nbsp;跑了&nbsp;&nbsp;再也见不到了</p><p></p>
